Title: You should separate your billing from entitlements - Arnon Shimoni

Title: An extremely unwinnable Slay the Spire seed, and how to find more
Description:
Overview
In this post, I will describe a collaborative effort that proved that unwinnable Slay the Spire seeds exist.  This project is joint work with gamerpuppy and ForgottenArbiter and is based on the several attempts that have been made to prove unwinnability for seeds in Slay the Spire.

Description:

As I...

Title: Some Bits: Nelson's weblog
Description:
Goodreads lost my entire account last week. Nine years as a user,
some 600 books and 250 carefully written reviews all deleted and
unrecoverable. Their support has not been helpful. In 35 years of
being online I've never encountered a company with such callous
disregard for their users' data.

Title: How to take credit for someone else's work on GitHub
Description: Browsing through Git's own Git repository on GitHub, I noticed something very strange. Git was famously created by Linus Torvalds, already widely known for having created the Linux operating system. However GitHub shows the author of the first commit to the Git repo as "VanTudor".
